articles.title: 130-foot asteroid hurtling towards Earth for a close approach TODAY, says NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA has tracked Asteroid 2023 QC8 rushing towards Earth in its orbit for a close approach today, October 5. Know details such as its speed, size, distance of approach, and more.
articles.content: Asteroids often pass Earth at close distances, posing a threat to the planet with their terrifying approaches. Most of them might seem like they're just floating rocks in space, but did you know aste… [+2576 chars]
